很   不错的 发泄游戏

A fun multiplayer experience working together to power generators, to open exit doors to win the game, or to rescue other "survivors" when they've been captured.  Alternatively play as the killer and chase down survivors so that they don't in fact survive.  :)  A little tricky to get the hang of at first, but after you gain a couple of levels it starts getting easier.  Play with either a wire keyboard / mouse or a fast gaming wireless keyboard / mouse or be prepared to be frustrated.

It can be fun but can also definitely be frustrating. Playing as a killer sometimes finding a game takes minutes other times just seconds. One game you get a bunch of people that don't seem to know what they're doing then the next you'll get demolished by pros. Playing as a survivor can be an exhilarating experience but can also end up being highly frustrating. Survivor is definitely more fun when you're playing with other people but can still be enjoyable solo.

At full price I would probably recommend it but if you can get it on sale I would highly recommend if you enjoy 1V4 games.

Я не скажу что игра настолько плоха но в ней есть свои плюсы, также возможность играть за убийцу за выжившего, ранги, перки, скины, но баги и вылеты бывают но это не мешает играть раньше были плохие тимейты ибо все выходят из игры но теперь они будут получать бан на 5 минут и он будет увеличиватся но я думаю если над игрой хорошо пороботать и добовлять новых маньяков и  выживших  вот тогда игра  будет классной но играть в неё тоже и сейчас можно.
Но чуть не забыл про манов кемперов они мешают игре пусть они тоже получают бан ибо так играть невозможно.
不用多说，玩一下就知道了，虽然玩法略显单调，但是让人上瘾
垃圾，拔线给惩罚，服务器又不弄好点，游戏不少bug，经常卡退，玩一阵就要重开一次
O client e servidores ainda dão problemas após todos esses anos,o jogo é praticamente pay to win e o balanceamento é uma palhaçada.
very good game to play with friends
除了玩屠夫排队慢。其他都好，

Pretty fun game, I would definitely recommend it, however go in expecting to lose a lot as survivor at first, you'll definitely struggle. Also be aware that the meta is pretty survivor biased, but you can still win as killer, just gotta do whatever you possibly can to combat gen rushing which is very difficult when you lack the perks.

Edit: I was a dumbass when I made this review. But hey, what can ya do?
You spend more time hating the game than actually enjoying it.

Amazing game, although as an old returning player I can say it's not something I could play constantly unless there was new content, an event going on or if there was some sort of goal as the repetitive game-play can get old and tedious as a solo queue player (Especially after ten-thousand hours of it...) however if you have a group of friends to play with from time to time or on a basis then I'd highly recommend giving this legend of a game a go!

Great game to play with friends or by yourself. Prediction of enemy movement is key whether you are the killer or a survivor. The mind games are very enjoyable.  While it does have its downs, such as, things being unbalanced, toxic players, camping killers, etc.They can merely be overlooked when it comes to the joy of out-thinking your opponent and surviving or getting a 4k as killer.
Me pone re nervioso, pero me encanta jsjs
I can murder people by vomiting on them. 10/10

its fun game when you play with your friends

Dead by Daylight is a fun game which you can play with your friends or solo. The game based on 2 modes. Killer mode and the survivor mode. In the killer mode you can choose between 10 or 15 killers which all have unique powers. Your main goal is to find the survivors and kill them. At first you only want to play this mode but when you play enough you understand the survivor mode is much more fun.At the survivor mode your main goal is to rebuild the generators in the map, avoiding the killer and once you rebuild all the gens you can finally escape. There is also so many different survivors in the game and all have different advantages but this is not very important because one you earn enough levels with a survivor you can you his unique power in other survivors. A little note for  beginners you can not out run the Killer because he or she is more faster than you you need to use certain obstacles in the map which in these case you are faster but killer is not.

it is fun with friends, but there's lots of frustrating mechanics that make you wanna completely uninstall, and sometimes there's a ton of bugs, the game is also somewhat unbalanced for both sides sometimes. Another issue with the game is how poorly optimized it is and the occasional time you get a super laggy lobby to where its almost unplayable. DC penalties are a really bad feature because what if you have to do something mid match, or your game is lagging like hell because of the bad servers. Overall a fun game sometimes with friends, and other times just a mess of a game.

It's a love hate relationship. When you think about playing, you think, oh yeah, that sounds good! Once you get playing for a bit and you get hit from 80 yards away, can't find a damn pallet for your life, and your teammates dc on first down, you wonder what choices you made throughout your life that led you to this moment. Then you quit. In an hour you will click the play button again, and repeat the cycle. The game hurts my head sometimes but I always crawl back. Maybe I have a problem, but find out for yourself. It's worth it.

I'm no longer able to enjoy this game with the graphical lag spikes during ever killer swing, skill check, gate opening, etc. not to mention the window vault and hatchet hitboxes. 

Fix these issues and I will be back. Until then, I'll be playing a game that doesn't rely entirely on reaction time with this many issues.

Gioco in se molto bello, atmosfera azzeccata e gameplay preciso.
Molte pecche nella meccanica, gioco obiettivamente troppo sbilanciato dalla parte dei sopravvissuti il che rende il Killer un ruolo veramente difficile da giocare. Meccaniche di movimento e di danno assolutamente da rivedere, logica di gioco completamente insensata e confusionaria per quanto riguarda Perk ed equipaggiamenti, personaggi giocabili veramente mal assortiti e mal gestiti.

Peccato, gioco che avrebbe avuto un grande potenziale. Pentito del mio acquisto.

''Recomendas este jogo'' não né porra, pergunta obvia do caralho, puta jogo de merda do caralho que só serve pra desgraçar a porra da tua cabeça, o jogo nunca foi muito bom não já foi um pouco melhor, antigamente quando o survivor era mais forte que o killer até era jogavel esse pedaço de merda digital, agora que o killer é bufado nem faz mais sentido jogar essa merda sendo que tu pode fazer é apanhar e correr igual uma pomba tomando tiro de espingarda de pressão, o jogo é cheio de bugs,erros e latencia alta, pois os devs desse jogo devem tar a mamar uma tromba gigantesca do tamanha do kid bengala nessa merda pra serem tão invisiveis e incompetentes com a comunidade que joga esse grande pedaço de merda, e ainda por cima resolvem lançar uma fucking atualização de merda mas bem merda e fodida de verdade mesmo que tu não PODE NEM KITAR NESSA PORRA LIXOSA DE MERDA MAIS PORRA, O KILLER É UMA 10 VEZES MAIS FORTE QUE TODOS OS 4  SOBREVIVENTES JUNTOS NESSA MERDA E VOCÊ TEM QUE TOMAR BIMBADA AGORA NESSA PORRA QUE NÃO NEM PRA ABANDONAR A PARTIDA MAIS ? VAI TOMAR NO CU JOGO FALIDO E RUIM DE MERDA ESPERO QUE VOCES VAO PRO CARALHO SEUS VERMES INSIGNIFICANTES FILHOS DA PUTA, TODA SANTA PARTIDA UM KILLER FILHO DA PUTA TRYHARD DE MERDA COM A PORRA DE UM MEMENTO ROSA QUE TE ENGANCHA UMA VEZ E TE MATA JÁ, COM UMA HITBOX DE MERDA, PULAR JANELA?=PAULADA, DEAD HARD?=PAULADA, NÃO IMPORTA O QUE FAÇA OS KILLER BUFADO E A HITBOX DE MERDA É PAULADA NA NUCA SEMPRE, CONCLUSÃO= JOGO CU DO CARALHO PUTA QUE PARIU MLK

2 games last night, haven't played much in a few months. First game as survivor (bronze 4) - other 3 survivors rush hooks and trade and game is over in about 6-7 minutes. Killer gets ez 4k. OK, whatever, bad survivors on, maybe I'll try killer. Second game as killer (ash 2) - Ghostface, Rotten Fields, 3 man SWF (maybe 4 man), 1 of them is a rank 1, and they bring 2 medkits with instaheals and bottled time. 

Bye Behavior, never playing your garbage game again.

It's good and scary as old the game is.
If you're a survivor, you depend too much in your fellow survivors, and lots of time you'll be left behind. Try to assemble a good team with friends+randoms so you can really enjoy the game.
If you're the murderer, you'll have to pick a favourite (Michael Myers is mine) and learn how to use it. Don't start trying to use all of them, because you'll lose lots and end deleting the game.
Something negative? sometimes other fellow survivors can be really toxic, as the murderers can be really campers. FPS are capped. You can unncap them, but you risk game crashing and getting reports in-game
